009package Point_Operations;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.WindowManager;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.Blitter;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.lib.ij.IjUtils;
020
021/**
022 * This plugin demonstrates alpha blending between two images:
023 * bg: the background image (passed to and modified by the run method),
024 * fg: the foreground image (selected in a user dialog).
025 * New (simpler) version using the {@code imagingbook.lib.ij.IjUtils.getOpenImages} library method.
026 * @author WB
027 */
028public class Linear_Blending implements PlugInFilter {
029        
030        static double alpha = 0.5;      // transparency of foreground image
031        ImagePlus imFG = null;          // foreground image (to be selected)
032        
033        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
034                return DOES_8G;
035        }       
036        
037        public void run(ImageProcessor ipBG) {  // iBG = background image
038                if(!runDialog()) {
039                        return;
040                }
041                ImageProcessor ipFG = imFG.getProcessor().convertToByte(false);
042                ipFG = ipFG.duplicate();
043                ipFG.multiply(1 - alpha);
044                ipBG.multiply(alpha);
045                ipBG.copyBits(ipFG, 0, 0, Blitter.ADD);
046        }       
047
048        boolean runDialog() {
049                // get list of open images and their titles:
050                ImagePlus[] images = IjUtils.getOpenImages(true);
051                String[] titles = new String[images.length];
052                for (int i = 0; i < images.length; i++) {
053                        titles[i] = images[i].getShortTitle();
054                }
055                // create the dialog and show:
056                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Alpha Blending");
057                gd.addChoice("Foreground image:", titles, titles[0]);
058                gd.addNumericField("Alpha value [0..1]:", alpha, 2);
059                gd.showDialog(); 
060                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
061                        return false;
062                }
063                else {
064                        imFG = images[gd.getNextChoiceIndex()];
065                        alpha = gd.getNextNumber();
066                        return true;
067                }
068        }
069}
